body.p: Numra is a program for practicing numerals. The program has two modi: Form numbers to numerals, and vice versa. We will also add exercises to learn the clock. The program is on the beta stage, but it can be tested here:
Numra differs from the other games in that is also has versions for South, Lule and Inari Sámi.
We recommend Numra to all students of Sámi: In order to learn a language you must know its numeral system.
